It's not fake...but it's not Age of the Hobbit---it's a Age of the Hobbits...3.2 rating on imdb!
The lawsuit will go nowhere. Hobbits were an Indonesian tribe from over 10,000 years ago, which this film makes clear. It's an okay b-movie styled fantasy film.

Pdid, the lawsuit will likely be successful. "Hobbit" is a registered trademark. Even the D&D folks had to use "halfling" instead. The term "hobbit" for the homo floresiensis is a nickname used by archeologists and anthropologists because of the small size, but it's not official at all. The Tolkien estate even banned scientists from using "hobbit" in lectures about this hominid.
Looks like it might have made a decent porn.

Asylum have made several straight to DVD movies with similar titles to big name productions that release just before the big name hits our screens. If you've seen any of those, you know what to expect.

I'm sure there's a porn title in the works somewhere too.
